DOC.brief_summary: This study is a comparison of outcome and complications encountered in flapless surgery and immediate loading versus the classical surgical approach and loading after 6-8 weeks in the posterior maxilla.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Outcome and Complications Encountered in Flapless Surgery and Immediate Loading Versus the Classical Surgical Approach and Loading After 6-8 Weeks in the Posterior Maxilla
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older Smoking Medical risk patients
